gcci.text: H100 lead times easing as US-East cloud regions add capacity, but HBM3e scarcity still constrains top-tier deployments.

gtpi.text: Input token pricing compresses toward $1/M as distillation and router-level optimization intensify price competition.

gagl.text: 120 TWh annual load risks grid strain; new baseload capacity and efficiency upgrades are essential to curb carbon intensity.

aipi.text: Industry sentiment is cautiously optimistic, with consolidation and capex discipline signaling sustainable growth ahead.
